title: Need a ffffound invite
content: Does anyone have a ffffound invite that they would give me. I've been searching for one for a long time. I will put you on my next Christmas list.
author: heymendoza

comments.content: Can someone explain to me why these invites are so coveted? We've had at least 4 threads about this in the last while.

Try [We heart it](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022904/http:/weheartit.com/). Just launched. Same concept as Ffffound but arguably a more functional design, plus tags and comments. Here's [my page](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022904/http:/weheartit.com/user/stewf).

Hmm, while that site looks interesting, Stephen, I think one of the plusses of ffffound is that there is only images. No tagclouds, pages of comments and other things that distract from the content.

But I'll take a loot at We heart it. :)

Tiff: I think, because Haley started a thread about it and when you google it typohile comes up as a top hit so people figure it's a good place to go. But if people actually read the threads they'd realize we don't have them.

Sorry! You can delete my thread if you want. I found an invite :) I basically had to ask everyone on the internet so good luck to you sir. Every member only gets one invite thats why they're so hard to find.

And ffffound is awesome because it doesn't have all those tags and comments and adding friends and listing your interests. It's anti social networking and that's totally fine with me.

Nothing ruins a good piece of design like some moron talking about how much he hates President Bush or PrincessGal69 inviting me to play online poker.
Haley & Quincunx - I get your drift, but there is nothing extra on We Heart except the comments and tags, and they are not intrusive.

I find the mouseovers annoying. I want large previews where I don't have to click to see the whole image.  
Don't get me wrong, I love tags. Pretty much the best things ever.  
But ffffound kinda does that automatically by sourcing words from the website the picture was saved from to give you suggestions of similar images. We heart it relies on user input and I notice a lot of the images don't have tags anyway. And I never ever thought I'd be saying this. But there's too much pink.

Ffffounds not perfect but I think i prefer it.
My big question is, does ffffound use a ligature for the first four letters of the word? If it doesn't I won't join.
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/found_01_4545.r2103.gif)
Well I thought I would just ask in hopes that someone could let me in. Thanks for replying anyways.

Haley Fiege said, "I found an invite :)"

Well then you're a slacker. I've been hitting that site incessantly for months and have yet to see ANY cake images!

You're totally right.

Here is my user: [http://ffffound.com/home/kingdomofawesome/found/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022904/http:/ffffound.com/home/kingdomofawesome/found/ "http://ffffound.com/home/kingdomofawesome/found/")
Like Tiffany, I have no idea what this site purports to be about - is it just an exclusive Flickr? Can someone enlighten me?

Haley, you have an invite to give out, then?

:-)

dr
No, it's more like del.icio.us, but with images instead of links.

Don, I think that pppperson in the llllogo is taping ligatures to the the 'f's

& I'd like an invite too. Thanks.

-=®=-
I'm not giving out my invite because everyone asks for it and it's not fair to decide between my friends.

Nice picture of delicious cake. I'm getting a sense of meanness though with all of the contrived charts of obstacles to cake, from medieval dogs to magnetic force fields.

Ffffound is about the found image. An endless visual jukebox randomly playing images. Ffffind more cake.

Thanks for mentioning 'We Heart It'. Niiice.

Dav  
_( [weheartit.com/user/dav](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022904/http:/weheartit.com/user/dav))_
If any one has a ffffound invite, please share. I promise to post responsibly.

You should also check [http://vi.sualize.us](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022904/http:/vi.sualize.us/ "http://vi.sualize.us")

No invites needed and pretty good stuff around. I'm using it to save the images I like on fffound ;) The good thing is that you can search for images, and find really interesting things.

It definitely worths a try!

damn,i love we heart it, but sure would love to be on ffffound!  
invite someone?  
 [chrisvilchez@gmail.com](mailto:chrisvilchez@gmail.com)

No one has invites here! Stop asking.

This thread comes up when you google my name now :|

Haley,

Since we aren't BFF's can you send me the ffffound invite? Just kidding, I hear what you are saying but if you change your mind please send it to [heymendoza@gmail.com](mailto:heymendoza@gmail.com) I wish we could get one started and then pass on the invites to each other until we are all in.

I would like an invite too! I'm student in grafic design and this site is so great to find inspiration!

[moutonoirx@gmail.com](mailto:moutonoirx@gmail.com)

thx!

Yes. If we could keep the process going, then we'd all be in eventually.  
Please, somebody...anybody...send me an invite. ^\_^  
 [leslie20n@gmail.com](mailto:leslie20n@gmail.com)  
Thanx!

Hey guys...

I've been hammering fffound for a while and really would love an invite...

If anyone has got one spare, please shoot it off to [edenhannon@gmail.com](mailto:edenhannon@gmail.com)  
Ill be happy to throw mine back on here once im in.

Thanks dudes and dudettes.

E
Haley you can collect the names of all interested on the invite. Gather all names in a bow and pick one, like a lottery. The winner takes it. I am out of it :-)

I would like an invite too! I’m grafic designer and this site is so great to find inspiration!

[vitaliyzolotoy@gmail.com](mailto:vitaliyzolotoy@gmail.com)

thx!

If anyone is interested in sending me an invite, I'd greatly appreciate it!

[blefferts@gmail.com](mailto:blefferts@gmail.com)

Thanks

I want one too. :(

[mandilou@gmail.com](mailto:mandilou@gmail.com)

i want an invitation as well, plz.

[schuyuan@gmail.com](mailto:schuyuan@gmail.com)

I think that anybody actually _reading_ the rest of this thread would have worked out that asking for an invite on here is probably about as effective as asking your dear old Gran for one. Repeatedly.

And by displaying your email addresses in plaintext on a well-trafficked forum, you're probably going to end up with a lot of invites to buy generic diet pills instead. Convenient!

Andi

[[semibad](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022904/http:/www.semibad.com/)]
Besides, ffffound is _so_ half a year ago. You wouldn't want to be ffffound dead there now.
Just use vi.sualize.us :)

hi, can i get one invite plz

[maxmaxmaxxx@gmail.com](mailto:maxmaxmaxxx@gmail.com)

thankssss!..

\> _Just use vi.sualize.us :)_

First thing you see on vi.sualize.us is **No invitation needed**.  
That's pretty funny and clever at the same time :)
All you have to do is email [ffffoundinvites@gmail.com](mailto:ffffoundinvites@gmail.com) , that's how I got mine
